songs.title: Save Someone
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
I'm here for you
And if you just breathed your last breath
I'd give you my air 'til I had nothing left
I'd never let you go

[Pre-Chorus]
If you were on the edge of a bridge
I'd push you to live
I'm your parachute, don't you ever forget
And if you get the chance to return the gift

[Chorus]
Promise me you'll save someone
If you can, if you can
Save someone
Understand, understand
Some have been chosen to wake up the broken
Promise you won't turn away
Oh, save someone
